name_localized.en: Partial Bay View King- Mobility Accessible

short_description_localized.en: Take in partial views of the San Francisco bay in this 330-square-foot room with mobility-accessible features and a king bed.

description_localized.en:
A plush king bed and mobility-accessible features in 330 square feet of space are rounded out by a partial view of the beautiful San Francisco bay, for a convenient, comfortable stay in the city.

One king bed - Mobility-accessible features - Luxury comfort bedding - WiFi - 55" Flat Panel HDTV w/streaming - Workstation with desk - Portable hearing impaired kits, lowered peephole, bed shaker alarm, visual strobe alarm, folding seat, ADA compliant phone, TTY Device, door bell
